entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VS MSBuild tests are broken and do not run in CI #64132
  • arglist is unnecessarily strict when given RTRS #64130
    C# 12.0
  • No Public API for top-level nullability of members #64123
  • Change RTRS default escape to ReturnOnly #64122
    17.4
  • Preview Changes Dialog Hides Project Information #64116

Closed

  • LSIF tool backward incompatibility #63409
    17.4
  • Lowering of `is (not) null` is opposite to the expected when the block is empty #64118
  • False-positive nullability warning #64117
  • RunTests should not write response files to repo root #63779
    17.4
  • IntelliSense is hard-selecting item not matching the case I'm writing #63922
    17.4
  • API Extensions: ILocalSymbol.IsReadOnly #59709
    Compiler.Next

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch to messagepack serialization/deserialization for our ID types #64135
    Area-IDE
  • Fix color issues for Stack Trace Explorer context menu #64134
    Area-IDE
  • Example is not packable #64133
    Area-IDE
  • Fix VisualStudioMSBuildInstalled attribute #64131
    Area-IDE
  • Fix missing Analyzer property ref in build #64129
    Area-Compilers
  • Add service which exists to tell OOP about solution events #64127
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Semantic snippets - Turn on experiment + turn off old snippets while new snippet experience is on #63991
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Follow up of #63985 #64126
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enforce new grammar rules that `scoped` keyword must be immediately followed by a type possibly “prefixed” by `ref`/`ref readonly`/`in`/`out`. #64088
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • NRT enable our servicehub code. #64128
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Upgrade System.Memory to fully fix another MSBuild loading issue #63545
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64121
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove unneeded SupportedDiagnostics override #62893
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Minor code cleanup for options #62906
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Set display window to false #64125
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Move test RSP to artifacts directory #64124
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Reorder a few things for clarity #64120
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add `MatchPriority.Deprioritize` and tweak item selection #63985
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Run speedometer automatically on PR validation #64097
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Remove out of proc TodoList computation #64110
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use pattern matching for multi-kind checks #64108
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Semantic Snippets - struct + a lot of abstracting #64016
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add `ILocalSymbol.IsForEach` and `IsUsing` #64004
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64114
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64115
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64137
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64136
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Consider types with ref fields as managed and Allow pointers of managed types in some contexts #64064
    Area-Compilers
  • Move to platform background work indicator #63629
    Area-IDE
  • Improve SymbolDisplay to handle operator symbols that are not valid operators for the target language. #64109
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Add ReturnOnly scope #64090
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Semantic snippets - interface snippet #64022
    Area-IDE
  • Enable NRT in analyzers layer #63090
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Make IPreviewService async, or synchronous with threading requirements #63661
    Area-IDE
  • Fix generate type dialog invoked on type argument in a base list #63378
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Avoid a first-chance exception if the PE reference doesn't exist #63878
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor RunTests #63948
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Infraswat
  • Assert option have editorconfig location #62905
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove roaming storage from `RemoveUnnecessarySuppressionExclusions` #62785
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fixed nullable warning for "change cast type" refactoring #64080
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix trivia handling in 'use named arguments' refactoring #63366
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add support for Suppression/Configuration fixes for build-only diagno… #63835
    Area-IDE
  • Check generic containing attribute types #64006
    Area-Compilers
  • `scoped` should set ref escape scope to current block #64093
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Fix parsing of lambda parameter named "scoped" #64085
    Area-Compilers
  • Delegate to base constructor when generating from members #63942
    Area-IDE
  • Assert unnecessary analyzers derive from AbstractBuiltInUnnecessaryCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62944
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Deprecate public constructors of various diagnostic analysis context types #64083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Blocked
